name: bfx-hf-ui
description: Official Bitfinex Honey UI - for live trading and executing algorithmic orders/strategies

scripts.start-server: cross-env concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-api-server" "npm run start-ds-bitfinex"
scripts.start: cd ./bfx-hf-ui-core && cross-env REACT_APP_DEV=1 REACT_APP_WSS_URL=ws://localhost:45000 REACT_APP_DS_URL=ws://localhost:23521 REACT_APP_UFX_API_URL=http://localhost:45001 REACT_APP_UFX_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:45001 REACT_APP_UFX_WSS_URL=wss://api-pub.bitfinex.com/ws/2 REACT_APP_IS_ELECTRON_APP=true node scripts/start.js
scripts.build: npm run fetch-core && npm run update-core && npm run preinstall && cd bfx-hf-ui-core && cross-env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build-css && cross-env REACT_APP_WSS_URL=ws://localhost:45000 REACT_APP_DS_URL=ws://localhost:23521 REACT_APP_UFX_API_URL=http://localhost:45001 REACT_APP_UFX_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:45001 REACT_APP_UFX_WSS_URL=wss://api-pub.bitfinex.com/ws/2 REACT_APP_IS_ELECTRON_APP=true node scripts/build.js
scripts.dev: cross-env concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-server" "npm run start"
scripts.electron-dev: cross-env concurrently "BROWSER=none npm run start-server"  & electron .
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cross-env electron-builder build -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js -lwm --publish always
scripts.build-all: npm run build && cross-env electron-builder build -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js -lwm --publish never
scripts.dist-win: cross-env npm run dist-win-unpruned && npm run package-win
scripts.dist-linux: cross-env electron-builder --linux -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js --publish never && npm run package-linux
scripts.package-mac: cd dist/bfx-hf-ui-mas-x64/bfx-hf-ui.app/Contents/Resources/app && sh clear.sh && node-prune && cd ../../../../../../ && zip --symlinks -r ./dist/bfx-hf-ui-mac-x64.zip ./dist/bfx-hf-ui-mas-x64 && cd ./dist/ && sha256sum bfx-hf-ui-mac-x64.zip >> sha256sums.asc && cd ..
scripts.package-win: cd dist/win-unpacked/resources/app && sh clear.sh && node-prune && cd ../../../../ && zip --symlinks -r ./dist/The.Honey.Framework-win.zip ./dist/win-unpacked && cd ./dist/ && sha256sum The.Honey.Framework-win.zip >> sha256sums.asc && cd ..
scripts.package-linux: cd dist/linux-unpacked/resources/app && sh clear.sh && node-prune && cd ../../../.. && zip --symlinks -r ./dist/The.Honey.Framework-x64-linux.zip ./dist/linux-unpacked && cd ./dist/ && sha256sum The.Honey.Framework-x64-linux.zip >> sha256sums.asc && cd ..

author: Bitfinex
